T02D2583:106a-1: a'a rya manydzu shr'i pra ti shatha bi dhi:/
T02D2583:106a-3: 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi rab tu gnas pa'i cho
T02D2583:106a-4: ga /'jam dpal gzhon nur gyur pa la phyag 'tshal
T02D2583:106a-5: lo // nyes pa kun dang rnam bral zhing //
T02D2583:106a-6: 'gro ba kun la phan mdzad pa //
T02D2583:106a-7: dang po kun la khyab gyur pa //
T02D2583:106a-9: de la dang por re zhig 'phags pa 'jam dpal gyi mtshan ma thob par byas la //
T02D2583:106a-10: dang por nyi ma bzang po la khrus bya zhing lus dri zhim pos byugs la /
T02D2583:106a-11: rgyan sna tshogs pas brgyan te /
T02D2583:106a-12: rab tu gnas pa'i yo byad kun pa sogs te /
T02D2583:106a-13: bdag nyid 'jam pa'i dbyangs kyi rnal 'byor dang ldan pas 'dug la /
T02D2583:106a-14: stegs bu gru bzhi pa dpangs su khru do pa
T02D2583:106a-15: bris la de'i steng du lugs sku dang po ti
T02D2583:106a-16: la sogs rab gnas bya bar 'os pa bzhugs su
T02D2583:106a-17: gsol te / so so'i sku bskyed byin gyis brlabs la /
T02D2583:106a-18: bla re la sogs pa sna tshogs kyis brgyan te /
T02D2583:106a-19: de la glu dang gar dang rol mo la sogs
T02D2583:106a-20: pas brgyan nas phyi dro'i dus su rim pas khrus
T02D2583:106a-21: byas te / de 'ang sku gzugs la na bza' ser po gsol te sbyang bar bya'o //
T02D2583:106a-22: de nas yang h'um yongs su gyur pa'i yungs kar khu tshur gnyis kyis bzung la bskor te /
T02D2583:106a-23: kham phor dang nye ba'i shing sas bskor ba lan gsum du byas nas /
T02D2583:106a-24: de bzhin du aom bzlas pa'i chus bskor ba lan gsum du bya'o //
T02D2583:106a-25: de nas ba'i rnam lnga dang d'ur ba'i pri gyis byug go //
T02D2583:106a-26: gzhan rnams ni me long la bkru'o //
T02D2583:106b-0: de nas dri @106b zhim pa'i chus byugs la /
T02D2583:106b-1: aom sarba ta th'a ga ta aa tsa shi dza ya badzra sv'a h'a /
T02D2583:106b-2: zhes pa'i man ngag gis byugs la /
T02D2583:106b-3: de au dumb'a ra la sogs pas phyi'o //
T02D2583:106b-4: de nas yang 'dag chal gyis byugs la /
T02D2583:106b-5: de nas bum pa rnams kyis khrus bya'o //
T02D2583:106b-6: de nas khrus sa'i stegs bu dkyil 'khor gyi bdag nyid du byas la /
T02D2583:106b-7: mchod pa nas rgyas gdab pa'i bar du byas la /
T02D2583:106b-8: de nas bum pa rnams dang dbu rgyan dang dar
T02D2583:106b-9: dbyangs kyi chas byas la mchod pa rnams kyis mchod
T02D2583:106b-10: nas bstod de bzlas pa bya'o //
T02D2583:106b-11: de nas bdag nyid kyis gtor ma btang ste /
T02D2583:106b-12: nang du sbyin sreg byas la /
T02D2583:106b-13: bdag nyid spos snod lag tu thogs la /
T02D2583:106b-15: rig sngags rgyal la phyag 'tshal lo //
T02D2583:106b-16: slob ma rnams la brtse ba dang //
T02D2583:106b-17: khyed rnams la yang mchod pa'i phyir //
T02D2583:106b-18: thugs rje'i bdag po can rab gnas //
T02D2583:106b-19: mgon po bdag ni bgyid par 'tshal //
T02D2583:106b-20: bcom ldan ba dag ni gus pa la //
T02D2583:106b-21: de bas gnang ba mdzad par rigs //
T02D2583:106b-22: bdag mid rdo rje 'di zhes bya //
T02D2583:106b-23: rig pa'i rgyal po 'di zhes bya //
T02D2583:106b-24: yo byad ci 'byor pa yis ni //
T02D2583:106b-25: gnang bas rab gnas bgyi bar 'tshal //
T02D2583:106b-26: bdag dang slob mar bcas pa la //
T02D2583:106b-27: thugs brtse bar ni nyer dgongs nas //
T02D2583:106b-28: tshogs pa thams cad rab gnas la //
T02D2583:106b-29: byin gyis brlab par mdzad du gsol //
T02D2583:106b-31: de nas mchod de yi ge brgya pa dang /
T02D2583:106b-32: rab tu gnas pa'i sngags bzlas la dge ba'i rtsa ba bsngo ste /
T02D2583:106b-33: rab gnas kyi lha gshegs su gsol la /
T02D2583:106b-34: bdag nyid bsrung ba'i phyir yang yi ge brgya pa bzlas so //
T02D2583:106b-35: de nas nang par langs la bdag nyid lha'i rnal
T02D2583:106b-36: 'byor byas la mchod pa'i yo byad thams cad bsags
T02D2583:106b-38: 'phags pa 'jam dpal bcom ldan 'das la sogs pa'i
T02D2583:106b-39: tshig la cang par byas la da ni bya ba
T02D2583:106b-41: sngar gyi lhag par gnas pa'i gshegs su gsol ba
T02D2583:106b-42: ma gtogs pa'i cho ga rnams ji lta ba bzhin
T02D2583:106b-43: du byas la / de nas rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor du bcug la /
T02D2583:106b-45: de ltar cho ga kun byas la /
T02D2583:106b-46: lha mo brgyad kyis mchod la bstod de /
T02D2583:107a-0: aom tsakshu tsakshu sa manta tsakshu bi sho dha ne @107a * //
T02D2583:107a-3: gser gyi thur mas sku gzugs kyi spyan phye la /
T02D2583:107a-4: 'jab tshes snyan bru ba dang thur mas shangs bsal ba dang /
T02D2583:107a-5: spu gris phyag sen breg pa dang /
T02D2583:107a-6: so mngas kyis dbu skra bshad pa dang /
T02D2583:107a-8: na bza' dang ba shos dbul te /
T02D2583:107a-9: a'a: dya aan nam sa m'a dha'i dhya na pri na ne sv'a h'a /
T02D2583:107a-10: ts'a ru la sogs pa'i phud dbul //
T02D2583:107a-11: de bzhin du so rtsi dang gos la sogs pa dbul te /
T02D2583:107a-13: de nas brtan par gsol ba btab la //
T02D2583:107a-15: nan tan byas la gtor ma btang ste /
T02D2583:107a-16: de nas rgyas pa'i sbyin sreg byas nas mthar slob ma g-yon du bzhag la sbyin sreg bya'o //
T02D2583:107a-17: tshigs bcad 'di yis yon blangs te /
T02D2583:107a-18: bla ma yongs su mnyes pa yis //
T02D2583:107a-19: las kyi dngos grub thob 'gyur pas //
T02D2583:107a-20: than bkur sti tsam gyis kyang //
T02D2583:107a-21: bla ma yongs su mnyes par bya'o //
T02D2583:107a-22: de nas sku gzugs la slob ma bskor ba lan gsum byed du bcug la /
T02D2583:107a-23: phyag dang mchod pa la sogs pa byed du bcug
T02D2583:107a-24: / slob dpon gyis phyogs skyong la gtor ma byin
T02D2583:107a-25: la / sku gzugs yun ring du gnas par bya ba dang /
T02D2583:107a-26: slob ma zhi bar bya ba'i phyir bya'o //
T02D2583:107a-27: bzod par gsol te sku gzugs rab tu gnas pa'o //
T02D2583:107a-28: pu sti la sogs pa rnams ni yi ge rnams
T02D2583:107a-29: gsung rdo rje chos su gyur pa'i yi ge bskyed
T02D2583:107a-30: par bya'o // lha khang dang mchod rten la sogs
T02D2583:107a-31: pa rnams ni rnam par snang mdzad du yongs su
T02D2583:107a-32: gyur par bsams la phyogs bcu nas ye shes sems
T02D2583:107a-33: par bya'o // dpa' bkug ste / sngar bstan pa
T02D2583:107a-34: bzhin du mchod pa la sogs pa byas nas snga
T02D2583:107a-36: rab gnas de ltar ma nus na /
T02D2583:107a-37: bdag nyid lhag pa'i lhar bsgoms te //
T02D2583:107a-38: rten rnams dgug sogs byas nas ni //
T02D2583:107a-39: so so rang gi sku bskyed de //
T02D2583:107a-40: ye shes sems dpa' bstim byas la /
T02D2583:107a-41: dbang rnams bskur te mchod pa bya //
T02D2583:107a-42: rten te bzlas pa ci nus bya //
T02D2583:107a-43: bgrang phreng rdo rje chos su bskyed //
T02D2583:107a-44: ye shes bcug ste mchod pa bya //
T02D2583:107a-45: de nyid gsung gi yi ger bsgyur //
T02D2583:107a-46: bzlas pa byas la brtan pa'o //
T02D2583:107a-47: de nas rtsa ba'i dkyil 'khor gyi cho ga ci rigs su bya'o /
T02D2583:107a-48: rab tu gnas pa'i cho ga 'di //
T02D2583:107b-0: bdag gis rang bzor @107b byas min te //
T02D2583:107b-2: kun gyis 'jam dbyangs thob par shog //
